Krhinos came up to a console and entered the plot course in the computer.

Krhinos: Is everything good? Are you all ready?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> --Rukus--
> 
> "All right, sir." Rukus salutes -- he figured it was appropriate -- 
> then he heads down to the transwarp drive room to make sure the 
> fluctuations remain at a minimum.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: I wrote a reply yesterday, but I never showed up... Stupid 
> Yahoo...
> > 
> > Bic:
> > 
> > Krhinos: There are some Dynamite Fairies inside and a Collosus 
> Drill
> > too. It'll all make the job easier. Dracon, man the engines. Start
> > them up and be ready in 20 cycles. Rukus, you're on the transwarp
> > drives. I'll plot the course and transmit it to you. Make sure 
> we've
> > got enough power. I'm going to be on the bridge to pilot the base.
> > Call me if there's anything. We leave when we're all done.
> >
